problem_statement: The existing React quote generator displays random quotes but lacks personalization and recovery features. Users cannot save meaningful quotes, search through saved items, or recover accidentally removed favorites. This limits usability and user engagement with the application. The goal is to enhance the app by adding favorites management, search functionality, and a robust undo mechanism while preserving simplicity.
FAIL_TO_PASS: Heart/Favorites Functionality > heart icon must exist to add quotes to favorites
Heart/Favorites Functionality > heart icon must show filled state when quote is favorited
Heart/Favorites Functionality > component must maintain favorites state
Heart/Favorites Functionality > must check if current quote is already favorited
Maximum Favorites Limit > maximum 10 favorites must be enforced
Maximum Favorites Limit > must check limit before adding new favorites
Duplicate Prevention > quotes with identical text are duplicates regardless of author
Favorites Display > favorites must be displayed in a list
Favorites Display > new favorites should be added to end of array (oldest first display)
localStorage Persistence > must use localStorage for persistence
localStorage Persistence > must load favorites from localStorage
localStorage Persistence > must save favorites to localStorage
localStorage Persistence > must load localStorage on component mount
Search Functionality > must have search input for filtering favorites
Search Functionality > must maintain search query in state
Search Functionality > search must be case-insensitive
Search Functionality > must filter by both quote text and author
Search Functionality > must have method to filter favorites
Undo Functionality > removing a favorite must show Undo option
Undo Functionality > undo button must appear for 5 seconds
Undo Functionality > must track pending removal for undo
Undo Functionality > must track original position for undo restore
Undo Functionality > must clear timeout when needed
Critical Behaviors > must consider pending removal when checking favorites limit
Critical Behaviors > localStorage should only update after undo timeout expires
Critical Behaviors > heart state must update in real-time when quote changes
PASS_TO_PASS: Original Quote Functionality > must import React
Original Quote Functionality > must import quotes data
Original Quote Functionality > must export Quote component
Original Quote Functionality > must have randomQuoteIndex in state
Original Quote Functionality > must have handleChange method for generating random quotes
Original Quote Functionality > must use Math.random for random quotes
Original Quote Functionality > must have Generate Random Quote button
Original Quote Functionality > must render quote text
Original Quote Functionality > must render author name
Original Quote Functionality > must have quote-section CSS class
Quotes Data > must export quotes function
Quotes Data > must return array of quotes
Quotes Data > each quote must have id, quote, and author fields
Quotes Data > must have at least 10 quotes
Component Structure > must be a valid React component
Component Structure > must have render method or return JSX
Component Structure > must return JSX with div elements
Code Structure Constraints > Quote should remain a class component
Code Structure Constraints > must not use external state management
Code Structure Constraints > must not use external timer libraries
